text: @PressSec I don’t wish for anyone to die of coronavirus even people irresponsibly promoting ignorance about it like Donald Trump & Herman Cain, who was last seen publicly at Trump’s Tulsa rally, but Trump’s shameful lack of leadership has led to thousands of deaths. https://t.co/yWgFbykK4w
